controls.title: Ensure separate partition exists for /dev/shm
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/fstab and add line: tmpfs /dev/shm tmpfs defaults,nodev,nosuid,noexec 0 0
controls.description: Verify /dev/shm is configured as separate partition

controls.title: Ensure nodev option set on /dev/shm partition
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/fstab and add nodev to /dev/shm mount options
controls.description: Verify nodev mount option is set on /dev/shm

controls.title: Ensure nosuid option set on /dev/shm partition
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/fstab and add nosuid to /dev/shm mount options
controls.description: Verify nosuid mount option is set on /dev/shm

controls.title: Ensure noexec option set on /dev/shm partition
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/fstab and add noexec to /dev/shm mount options
controls.description: Verify noexec mount option is set on /dev/shm
